data.title: Mindy
data.text:
FULL NAME: Melinda Sue Lewis

BIRTHDAY: August 26, 1965

PORTRAYED BY:

Krista Tesreau--1983-1990 &

Kimberley Simms--1990-1992; 1997

Ann Hamilton--1993

Barbara Crampton--1993-95

FIRST SCENES:

LAST SCENES:

FAMILY:

Mindy was born and raised in Tulsa, Oklahoma. Her mother died when she was young, and her father married Reva Shayne. Mindy was not fond of her step-mother growing up. When Mindy and Billy (now divorced from Reva) moved to Springfield, Billy met Vanessa Chamberlain and Mindy got a new step-mother she liked.

Mindy's family is quite large, led by her granddaddy, H.B. Lewis. Her grandmother, Miss Martha, passed away when she was a girl, but is fondly remembered. It was revealed in 1985 that Sally Gleason was Billy's natural mother, making her Mindy's grandmother. Mindy also has an Aunt Trish, Uncle Josh, brother Bill (Billy & Vanessa's son), cousins Marah and Shayne (by Josh & Reva), and cousin/half-brother Dylan (Billy & Reva). Reva never drifted far from the Lewises, going from Mindy's step-mother to step-grandmother to aunt.

KYLE SAMPSON:

Rick went on a few dates with Springfield U. friend and classmate. Rick and Beth went to the Prom together. But when she was chosen Prom Queen to Phillip's King, Rick sensed that his best friend also had feelings for her. Despite developing strong feelings for Beth, Rick stepped aside when Phillip & Beth realized that they were in love with each other.
